mapper.insert: insert into dream_article(id, title,content,chanid,channame, atime,summary,localurl, imgids, sortnum) values(#{id},#{title},#{content},#{chanId},#{channame},#{atime},#{summary},#{localurl},#{imgids}, #{sortnum})
mapper.update: update dream_article set title=#{title},content=#{content},chanid=#{chanId},channame=#{channame}, summary=#{summary}, imgids=#{imgids}, sortnum=#{sortnum}, localurl=#{localurl} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select id,title,atime,summary,localurl,imgids,sortnum,channame from dream_article where atime > #{atime} order by sortnum, atime desc

select id,title,chanid,channame,atime,summary,localurl,imgids,sortnum from dream_article
AND title like "%"#{title}"%"
AND chanid = #{chanid}
order by sortnum, atime desc
select id,title,chanid,channame,atime,summary,localurl,sortnum from dream_article where chanid=#{chanId} order by sortnum, atime desc
